text: ane jani lo ke tamari vacce allahana payagambara hajara che, jo te saman'ya rite tamaru kahyu mane, ghana karyomam tame muskelimam muka'i java, parantu allaha ta'ala'e imanane tamara mate priya banavi didhu che ane tene tamara hrdayomam sanagari rakhyum che, ane inkara tatha papane tatha avajnane tamara mate tiraskara banavi didhu che, a ja loko satyamarga para che
